DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and perform preliminary clinical evaluation in patients with mild to moderate CDAD.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a dose-finding study to select a safe and efficacious dose of OPT-80. Patients will be evaluated for safety and efficacy and pharmacokinetic parameters will be investigated.
DOC.criteria: Patients with CDAD Patients with severe CDAD
